data.partBlankContent: De Vere was the only son of John de Vere, 16th Earl of Oxford, and Margery Golding. After t__ death o_ his fat___ in 1562, h_ became a ward o_ Queen Elizabeth and w__ sent t_ live i_ the hous_____ of h__ principal adv____, Sir William Cecil. He mar____ Cecil's daug____, Anne, wi__ whom h_ had fi__ children. De Vere was estranged from her for five years after he refused to acknowledge her first child as his.
data.fullContent: De Vere was the only son of John de Vere, 16th Earl of Oxford, and Margery Golding. After the death of his father in 1562, he became a ward of Queen Elizabeth and was sent to live in the household of her principal advisor, Sir William Cecil. He married Cecil's daughter, Anne, with whom he had five children. De Vere was estranged from her for five years after he refused to acknowledge her first child as his.
data.answer: 德维尔是第16届牛津伯爵约翰·德维尔和玛格瑞·戈尔丁的独生子。1562年他父亲去世后，他成为伊丽莎白女王的监护人，并被送到她的主要顾问威廉·塞西尔爵士家中居住。他娶了塞西尔的女儿安妮，并育有5个孩子。德维尔在拒绝承认她的第一个孩子是自己的孩子后，与她疏远了五年。
